snippet: The former Utah governor and ambassador to China, who was appointed this week to the board of Ford Motor Company, was expected to help strengthen the automaker's position in Asia.
abstract: The former Utah governor and ambassador to China, who was appointed this week to the board of Ford Motor Company, was expected to help strengthen the automaker's position in Asia.
lead_paragraph: Former Utah governor Jon M. Huntsman Jr., who dropped his bid for the Republican Presidential nomination in January, rejoined the private sector this week with his appointment to the board of directors at the Ford Motor Company.

headline.main: Jon Huntsman: From Campaign Trail to Ford's Board
